Token.Abstract: The PWDirectionsRequest class is used by apps that work with indoor directions. To request directions, create a new instance of this class and configure it with the start and end points you need. Then, create a PWDirections object and use the methods of that class to initiate the request and process the results.
The waypoints (i.e. start and end points) to use for calculating directions. This array will always contain exactly two points.
The waypoints (i.e. start and end points) to use for calculating directions. This array will always contain exactly two points.
The waypoints (i.e. start and end points) to use for calculating directions. This array will always contain exactly two points.
The options to use for calculating directions.
The options to use for calculating directions.
The options to use for calculating directions.
Creates, initializes and returns a PWDirectionsRequest object with the specified waypoints and routing options.

Parameter.Name: waypoints
Parameter.Abstract: The source and destination locations. These locations must conform to the PWDirectionsWaypoint protocol. If fewer than two points are provided, an assertion failure will be thrown. If more than two points are provided, the first and last waypoints in the array will be used as the end points and all other points will be ignored.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: The directions options for this request. The provided options will be copied.

Token.Abstract: The starting point for routing directions. This value will be nil if the request is initialized with initWithLocation:destination:type:. (read-only)
The starting point for routing directions. This value will be nil if the request is initialized with initWithLocation:destination:type:. (read-only)
The starting point for routing directions. This value will be nil if the request is initialized with initWithLocation:destination:type:. (read-only)
Initializes and returns a PWDirectionsRequest object with a source and destination annotation.

Parameter.Name: source
Parameter.Abstract: The source annotation. This object must conform to PWAnnotationProtocol and cannot be nil.

Parameter.Name: destination
Parameter.Abstract: The destination annotation. This object must conform to PWAnnotationProtocol protocol and cannot be nil.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type of directions for this request.

Token.Abstract: Initializes and returns a PWDirectionsRequest object with a source location and destination annotation.

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: The source location. This object must conform to the PWLocation protocol and cannot be nil.

Parameter.Name: destination
Parameter.Abstract: The destination annotation. This object must conform to PWAnnotationProtocol and cannot be nil.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type of directions for this request.
